library(learnr)

tutorial_options(
  exercise.checker = gradethis::grade_learnr
)

borders_data <- readRDS("www/data/borders.rds")
borders_age_data <- read_csv("www/data/BORDERS (inc Age).csv")

baby6 <- read_csv("www/data/Baby6.csv")
